long_description: Whether worn solo in hot weather or as a base layer in cold conditions, the men's NRS H2Core(TM) Rashguard breathes freely, wicks moisture and protects your skin from abrasion when you're paddling. Fabric wicks moisture away from the skin, breathes freely and dries quickly for cool comfort on the water; UPF 45 sun protection. The silky exterior ensures fluid, athletic performance while the brushed inner surface feels soft and cool on your skin. Performance cut allows unrestricted movement and creates friction-free zones under the arms for comfortable paddling.
short_description: Whether worn solo in hot weather or as a base layer in cold conditions, the men's NRS H2Core(TM) Rashguard breathes freely, wicks moisture and protects your skin from abrasion when you're paddling.
